name: Charges
businessSemantics: Represents various charges applicable, such as for accommodation, drugs, and health checks.

name: Sizes
businessSemantics: Represents the size categories for dogs, such as Small, Medium, and Large.

name: Treatment Types
businessSemantics: Represents the types of treatments available, such as Physical examination, Vaccination, and Walking.

name: Owners
businessSemantics: Represents dog owners, including their contact information.

name: Dogs
businessSemantics: Represents dogs, including details such as breed, size, name, age, and ownership.
joinSql: SELECT Dogs.*, Breeds.breed_name, Sizes.size_description, Owners.first_name, Owners.last_name FROM Dogs JOIN Breeds ON Dogs.breed_code = Breeds.breed_code JOIN Sizes ON Dogs.size_code = Sizes.size_code JOIN Owners ON Dogs.owner_id = Owners.owner_id

name: Professionals
businessSemantics: Represents professionals, including their roles and contact information.

name: Treatments
businessSemantics: Represents treatments performed on dogs, including the type of treatment, the professional who performed it, and the cost.
joinSql: SELECT Treatments.*, Dogs.name AS dog_name, Professionals.first_name AS professional_first_name, Treatment_Types.treatment_type_description FROM Treatments JOIN Dogs ON Treatments.dog_id = Dogs.dog_id JOIN Professionals ON Treatments.professional_id = Professionals.professional_id JOIN Treatment_Types ON Treatments.treatment_type_code = Treatment_Types.treatment_type_code
